languages.text: "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость, иначе и не умею". {n}Пиратка натянуто смеется.{/n} "Все, не смею докучать благословенному Вольному Торговцу своими опасениями".

traits.locale_text: "Иначе и не умею, почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая}! Не переживайте, к бунту я присоединяться не собираюсь. Если Владайм так хочет в могилу, то пусть ползет туда сам, а меня оставит в стороне".
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's the only way I know." {n}The pirate laughs a strained laugh.{/n} "That's all. I wouldn't presume to trouble the gracious Rogue Trader with my concerns any longer."
languages.original_text: "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость, иначе и не умею". {n}Пиратка натянуто смеется.{/n} "Все, не смею докучать благословенному Вольному Торговцу своими опасениями".

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's the only way I know." {n}The pirate laughs a strained laugh.{/n} "That's all. I wouldn't presume to trouble the gracious Rogue Trader with my concerns any longer."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: “我很抱歉，大人，但我只能靠这招了。”{n}莱萨紧张地大笑起来。{/n}“那就这样吧， 我不该继续打扰这位和蔼可亲的行商浪人了。”
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's the only way I know." {n}The pirate laughs a strained laugh.{/n} "That's all. I wouldn't presume to trouble the gracious Rogue Trader with my concerns any longer."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉，大人，但我只能靠这招了。”{n}莱萨紧张地大笑起来。{/n}“那就这样吧， 我不该继续打扰这位和蔼可亲的行商浪人了。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「申し訳ございません、陛下。私はその方法しか知らないんですよ」{n}海賊は苦笑する。{/n}「それだけです。もう、私ごとき不安で、優秀な自由開拓者に迷惑をかけたりはしません」
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's the only way I know." {n}The pirate laughs a strained laugh.{/n} "That's all. I wouldn't presume to trouble the gracious Rogue Trader with my concerns any longer."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ございません、陛下。私はその方法しか知らないんですよ」{n}海賊は苦笑する。{/n}「それだけです。もう、私ごとき不安で、優秀な自由開拓者に迷惑をかけたりはしません」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Lo siento, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}La pirata suelta una risa tensa.{/n} «Eso es todo. No me atrevería a molestar más con mis preocupaciones {mf|al amable|a la amable} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's the only way I know." {n}The pirate laughs a strained laugh.{/n} "That's all. I wouldn't presume to trouble the gracious Rogue Trader with my concerns any longer."

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}La pirata suelta una risa tensa.{/n} «Eso es todo. No me atrevería a molestar más con mis preocupaciones {mf|al amable|a la amable} Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Es tut mir leid, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, anders kenne ich es nicht." {n}Die Piratin lacht angespannt.{/n} "Das ist alles. Ich würde nicht wagen, {mf|den ehrenwerten Freihändler|die ehrenwerte Freihändlerin} noch länger mit meinen Sorgen aufzuhalten."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's the only way I know." {n}The pirate laughs a strained laugh.{/n} "That's all. I wouldn't presume to trouble the gracious Rogue Trader with my concerns any longer."

traits.locale_text: "Es tut mir leid, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, anders kenne ich es nicht." {n}Die Piratin lacht angespannt.{/n} "Das ist alles. Ich würde nicht wagen, {mf|den ehrenwerten Freihändler|die ehrenwerte Freihändlerin} noch länger mit meinen Sorgen aufzuhalten."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Je m'excuse, Votre Seigneurie, mais je ne connais pas d'autres méthodes, {n}répond-elle avec un petit rire nerveux.{/n} Bien, je m'en voudrais de vous faire perdre votre temps avec mes petits problèmes. »
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's the only way I know." {n}The pirate laughs a strained laugh.{/n} "That's all. I wouldn't presume to trouble the gracious Rogue Trader with my concerns any longer."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'excuse, Votre Seigneurie, mais je ne connais pas d'autres méthodes, {n}répond-elle avec un petit rire nerveux.{/n} Bien, je m'en voudrais de vous faire perdre votre temps avec mes petits problèmes. »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Affedersin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, başka yol bilmem ben." {n}Korsan, gerginlikle gülüyor.{/n} "Diyeceğim bu kadardı. Lütufkâr Hür Tacir'i dertlerimle daha fazla yormak aklımdan dahi geçmez."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, it's the only way I know." {n}The pirate laughs a strained laugh.{/n} "That's all. I wouldn't presume to trouble the gracious Rogue Trader with my concerns any longer."
